trans-unit.source: Implement and attach to a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter"></xref> object to control how the importer maps Web Services Description Language (WSDL) parts to those of a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Implementar e anexar a um <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter"> </xref> partes do objeto para controlar como o importador mapeia WSDL Web Services Description Language () de um <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Implement the IWsdlImportExtension interface to control the mapping between WSDL and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> objects, especially when reading custom WSDL extensions to modify your contract or endpoint information.
trans-unit.target: Implementa a interface IWsdlImportExtension para controlar o mapeamento entre WSDL e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>objetos, especialmente ao ler as extensões WSDL personalizadas para modificar suas informações de contrato ou ponto de extremidade.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: Then attach your custom IWsdlImportExtension object to a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> either programmatically or by using an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Conecte seu objeto personalizado IWsdlImportExtension um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter>programaticamente ou usando um arquivo de configuração do aplicativo.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter>

trans-unit.source: You can also attach your custom IWsdlImportExtension object to the internal <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> used by the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) using an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode anexar o objeto IWsdlImportExtension personalizado para interno <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter>usado pelo [Ferramenta Utilitária de metadados ServiceModel (Svcutil.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) usando um arquivo de configuração do aplicativo.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A> method is called to import a contract.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A>método é chamado para importar um contrato.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.BeforeImport%2A> method to modify the metadata that is then imported into <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> objects.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.BeforeImport%2A>método de modificar os metadados que são então importados para <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>objetos.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.BeforeImport%2A>

trans-unit.source: Called prior to importing metadata documents.
trans-unit.target: Chamado antes da importação de documentos de metadados.

trans-unit.source: The BeforeImport methods of all registered <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> objects is called before anything is imported from the supplied metadata.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos de BeforeImport de todos os registrados <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension>objetos é chamado antes de qualquer coisa é importada de metadados fornecido.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension>

trans-unit.source: The service descriptions to modify.
trans-unit.target: As descrições de serviços para modificar.

trans-unit.source: The schema collection to be used when importing.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de esquema a ser usado durante a importação.

trans-unit.source: The policy assertions used when importing.
trans-unit.target: As declarações de política usadas durante a importação.

trans-unit.source: Called when importing a contract.
trans-unit.target: Chamado durante a importação de um contrato.

trans-unit.source: The ImportContract method is called when a contract is being imported.
trans-unit.target: O método ImportContract é chamado quando um contrato está sendo importado.

trans-unit.source: You can modify the contract or insert other exporting behaviors such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=fullName> and an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=fullName> objects to modify the code that is generated for the contract.
trans-unit.target: Você pode modificar o contrato ou inserir outros comportamentos de exportação, como <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=fullName>e um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=fullName>objetos para modificar o código que é gerado para o contrato.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The importer.
trans-unit.target: O importador.

trans-unit.source: The import context to be modified.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de importação a ser modificado.

trans-unit.source: Called when importing an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Chamado durante a importação de um ponto de extremidade.

trans-unit.source: The ImportEndpoint method is called when importing an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: O método ImportEndpoint é chamado durante a importação de um ponto de extremidade.

trans-unit.source: Modify the context properties to customize the imported endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Modificar as propriedades de contexto para personalizar o ponto de extremidade importado.

trans-unit.source: The importer.
trans-unit.target: O importador.

trans-unit.source: The import context to modify.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de importação para modificar.
